entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
